summary: Implement missing worker concurrency and rate limiting options from WorkerOptions. Partial implementation exists for maxConcurrentActivityExecutions and maxConcurrentWorkflowTaskExecutions, with other limits pending Core SDK support.
userImpact: Users cannot fully control worker resource consumption without complete implementation of all WorkerOptions limits.
rootCause: Some rate limiting features not yet implemented in Core SDK; partial implementation existed in PR #71.
proposedFix: Expose maxTaskQueueActivitiesPerSecond and implement remaining rate limits as Core SDK support becomes available.
resolutionDetails: Implemented through phased approach starting with PR #71 for maxConcurrentActivityExecutions and maxConcurrentWorkflowTaskExecutions, with additional limits added as Core SDK support became available.
keyQuote: Worker should respect the limits defined in WorkerOptions
